attributes.review: when you first open the app the first thing you see is not aesthetically pleasing🤮. would not recommend. second this app is horribly glitchy and uses your location which drains battery life. if i were you i would not waste my battery life on my precious phone just to support an 🍊 but i mean that’s up to you. it’s for 17 and up but i mean what about the younger kids in this generation i mean he clearly favors them iykyk so why wouldn’t he make a children friendly app. smh. take away tiktok trump i dare you hen z will not stop trying to take you down. taking away tiktok will make it worse
attributes.title: tweets more than he rubs his country

attributes.review: look I downloaded this app because I want to see our beautiful Cheeto president, that didnt work out❤️ long story short this app is like literally so laggy and there are ads everywhere🥰 (btw the president is such a baddie just take out the bad😘🧚‍♀️✨🌈 for legal reasons this is a joke, muah) ANYWAYS i really hope this Cheeto doesn’t shut tiktok down bc if he does I will cry like fr I will actually cry my eyes out . so yeah bye bye☺️
attributes.title: Ugh

attributes.review: Because i downloaded this app my phone has been acting up. i don’t understand why when i have one of the newest versions of iphone and use apps like tik tok with no issue. this app caused for my phone to glitch and completely shut down at one point, it almost scared me it felt like this app was trying to get my info, i had to delete it.
attributes.title: ‼️THIS APP MESSED UP MY PHONE‼️

attributes.review: I’ve been supporting Trump from day 1 and this just disappointed me completely!!!!! Too many ads and just way to complicated for me to see the news. It also took away too much battery from my phone. I would download it again but it definitely needs to improve I expected better!!!!!!!!!
attributes.title: Hard to Navigate!!

attributes.review:
I am not a trump supporter at all but I wanted to see he’s plans just in case he gets elected.
This app took up alot of space on my phone and when i did open it, it took 5 minutes! And when I opened I had too make an account with my personal information just to see a couple plans. I am Hispanic and I feel like trump doesn’t treat us the same. trump = 🤢🤮
attributes.title: trump 🤮

attributes.review: No no no. If you want the most evil and horrifying presents in your life then yes by all means this app is for you. Although I shall give my fellow Americans a taste of what this horrid app is and what it brings. 1. It supports the most disgusting and disrespectful man on this earth 2. It may cause you to start to say racist and unholy things. 3. You may start to lose hearing which also comes with being blind and no friends.
attributes.title: Tessa

attributes.review: I opened up this app and saw this orange thing with little hair on his head. He said he wanted to “make America great again” HAHA, no. If his intentions to make America great again is to ban the best app in this world, I’m not here for it. He literally is an orange creature trying to ruin everything. This app almost broke my phone. My phone is anti-trump. All I did was open it and saw a picture of that dude and it cracked. I HIGHLY DONT RECOMMEND DOWNLOADING.
attributes.title: No🍊

attributes.review: I was downloading all the apps so I can be well informed but as soon as I opens the app it started crashing my phone and asked me for my personal info, then spammed me over and over on everything 😡😡😡 email Facebook text you name it just blocking up my phone. I wouldn’t download this if you don’t like having a bunch of spam
attributes.title: Immediately spammed with ads

attributes.review: This is dumb, it took a week to download and then people showed up to my house and took my pumpkins I DONT EVEN HAVE PUMPKINS. That’s not even the worst part the app took over my social media and made trump filters😭 then after I tried to delete the app it wouldn’t let me and it takes up sooooo much space even before you open the app- 1 star would not recommend
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: When I got the app I started to get strange notifications saying that if I didn’t vote for trump they would sell my house. I got a notification from the house committee the next day. I was just at home sipping on my STARBUCKS MOCHA FRAPPUCINNO and the trump administration busted down my door, forcing their way inside. They told me to get out because my house was being seized. DO NOT GET THIS APP, IT MAY COST YOU YOUR LIFE.
attributes.title: This app made me sell my house
